role.argrole: thing arg0 is in control of

example.parse: (IP (CP-CND (ADVP (CS 如果)) (IP (NP-SBJ (PN 他们)) (VP (VV 能) (VP (PP-PRP (P 对) (NP (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 掌控) (NP-OBJ (NP (QP (CD 几千亿)) (NP (NN 台币))) (NP (NN 预算))))) (DEC 的))) (ADJP (JJ 高阶)) (NP (NN 主管)))) (VP (VE 有) (NP-OBJ (ADJP (JJ 良性)) (NP (NN 影响)))))))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (DNP (PP (P 对) (NP (NN 国家) (NN 社会))) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 贡献))) (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VC 是) (VP (ADVP (AD 更)) (VP (VA 大))))))
example.arg: 几千亿 台币 预算
